      Constructor and Description
      MenuPlayer()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Act method being executed every frame, first frame will set the proper location of the alien in the memory For the rest simply counts the frames to apply the right image and move the player around in the animation
